jeda.pub: It's a pleasure to Jeda your apps
jeda.description: Jeda stand for : Java / Javascript Express Data Access
jeda.about:
Jeda stand for : Java / JavaScript Express Data Access
Declare your Java Domain Bean with standard Annotation (validation: JSR 303, ...)+ Jeda Annotation.
Jeda do all for you: default view and navigation, persistence, search...
